content.raw: I think it will be a little longer than that unfortunately! I'd say about 1-2 months. So do with that what you will, and I'll let you know if it's looking likely to materialise sooner. Realistically it will be done over the course of a few days, but I don't expect to get to it for at least 2 weeks, and more likely longer - so 1-2 months might be a reasonable estimate.
